value.title: New AI from DeepMind and Google can detect a common cause of blindness

value.title: How AI could predict sight-threatening eye conditions
value.excerpt: Age-related macular degeneration (AMD) is the biggest cause of sight loss in the UK and USA and is the third largest cause of blindness across the globe. value.title: Using AI to predict retinal disease progression
value.excerpt: Vision loss among the elderly is a major healthcare issue: about one in three people have some vision-reducing disease by the age of 65. value.title: Elon Musk has a complex relationship with the A.I. community
value.excerpt: Elon Musk is one of the first investors in DeepMind, he helped set up the $1 billion OpenAI research lab, and he's often making comments about AI. WWIII, more dangerous than nukes, scariest problem: several people in the AI community told CNBC that they struggle to take Musk's AI comments seriously.

value.excerpt: Specification gaming is a behaviour that satisfies the literal specification of an objective without achieving the intended outcome.
